name: Chasm Spelunkers
desc: Now that you have destroyed the Bedrock Keys, the seal on The Chasm has now come undone. It is time to venture into the depths below.

customize.name: Surreptitious Seven-Star Seal Sundering
customize.desc: You have accepted a commission that requires you to pay The Chasm a visit. Who knows what the situation in the long-sealed mines might be like...

customize.name: The Chasm Delvers
customize.desc: A World Quest Series following Zhiqiong, an aspiring adventurer, to investigate The Chasm: Underground Mines.

customize.name: The Chasm Charters
customize.desc:
Accept the commission from Lan
Lan of the Adventurers' Guild has offered you a commission to explore The Chasm, which you have accepted. First, you'll need to find the representative of the Ministry of Civil Affairs, Muning, who has been stationed there.

Accept the commission from Xu
You accept Xu's commission to deliver the Mora Xingqiu has lent out to the Ministry of Civil Affairs' specialist, Muning, at The Chasm.

customize.name: Surreptitious Seven-Star Seal Sundering
customize.desc: You have accepted a commission that requires you to pay The Chasm a visit. Who knows what the situation in the long-sealed mines might be like...

customize.name: Chasm Spelunkers
customize.desc: Now that you have destroyed the Bedrock Keys, the seal on The Chasm has now come undone. It is time to venture into the depths below.

customize.name: First Miasmic Contact
customize.desc: Investigate the mysterious environs beneath the stone and take pictures related to the black mud.

customize.name: Meeting New People... and Foiling Some Bandits
customize.desc: As you explore the lower levels of The Chasm, you discover Treasure Hoarders. If they think you'll let them do things as they please down here, then they've got another think coming!

customize.name: The Heavenly Stone's Debris
customize.desc: To get to ever-deeper levels of The Chasm, you must open the path that was blocked by large stones back when the mine was sealed. Looks like you'll have to borrow the power of the Mountainator this time...

customize.name: Perils in the Dark
customize.desc: The strange crystal plummeted toward the ground and shattered it, revealing an entrance to even greater depths. Who knows what's down there... But either way, it would be best to proceed with caution.

customize.name: Wherefore Did the Spiritstone Descend?
customize.desc: Having taken out the Abyss Lectors lurking here, you discover that Zhiqiong has seen the symbols on the key-like object the Lectors left behind somewhere else...

customize.name: Adventure EXP
customize.desc: Adventure EXP. Used to improve Adventure Rank.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Hero's Wit
customize.desc:
Character EXP material. Gives 20000 EXP.
These experiences are extremely precious for a pilgrim traveling through Teyvat in order to be closer to Celestia.

customize.name: Lumenstone Ore
customize.desc: The raw ore from which Lumenstone may be found. If processed properly, it can be used to strengthen the Lumenstone Adjuvant you have. Why not hit Jinwu up and ask her?

customize.text:
Enter the mines of <color=#ece5d8>The Chasm</color>
Talk to the team members
Investigate the

customize.name: Lumenspar
customize.desc:
A sky-blue crystal that glitters so brightly that it brings forth echoes of the heavens above, which cannot be seen from underground...

If you hold it up to your ear, you can almost hear a soft sigh coming from within.

This might sound strange, but this crystal also gives off a faint warmth.

customize.name: Zhiqiong
customize.desc: A member of the Adventurers' Guild. She has incredible talent for cartography.

customize.name: Jinwu
customize.desc: A technician who has spent more than 20 years at The Chasm. She is the leader of the Chasm Exploration Team.

customize.text:
Look for clues as to Uncle He's whereabouts
Tell Jinwu about what you've discovered of Uncle He's whereabouts
Go to the exploration team's camp
Talk to Jinwu
Look for Zhiqiong, who went off on her own
Talk to Zhiqiong
Complete Zhiqiong's commission
Return to the exploration team's camp
Talk to Zhiqiong

customize.name: Zhiqiong
customize.desc: A member of the Adventurers' Guild. She has incredible talent for cartography.

customize.name: Jinwu
customize.desc: A technician who has spent more than 20 years at The Chasm. She is the leader of the Chasm Exploration Team.
